name: Rider-Waite-Smith
description: The classic Rider-Waite-Smith tarot deck, the most popular and widely recognized tarot deck in the world.
author: Arthur Edward Waite

cards.name: The Fool
cards.upright_meaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit, adventure, potential, fresh start
cards.reversed_meaning: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration, foolishness, lack of direction

cards.name: The Magician
cards.upright_meaning: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action, creativity, willpower
cards.reversed_meaning: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents, lack of focus, illusion

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.upright_meaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious mind, inner wisdom
cards.reversed_meaning: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal, silence, repressed feelings

cards.name: The Empress
cards.upright_meaning: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance, creativity, fertility
cards.reversed_meaning: Creative block, dependence on others, smothering, lack of growth

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.upright_meaning: Authority, establishment, structure, father figure, leadership, stability
cards.reversed_meaning: Tyranny, rigidity, coldness, domination, excessive control

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.upright_meaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
cards.reversed_meaning: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo, unconventional

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.upright_meaning: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices, partnerships
cards.reversed_meaning: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values, relationship issues

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.upright_meaning: Control, willpower, success, determination, direction, focus
cards.reversed_meaning: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction, scattered energy

cards.name: Strength
cards.upright_meaning: Strength, courage, persuasion, influence, compassion, inner power
cards.reversed_meaning: Self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion, lack of confidence, weakness

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.upright_meaning: Soul searching, introspection, inner guidance, solitude, seeking truth
cards.reversed_meaning: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal, lost your way, avoiding introspection

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.upright_meaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point, fortune
cards.reversed_meaning: Bad luck, lack of control, clinging to control, unwelcome changes

cards.name: Justice
cards.upright_meaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law, balance
cards.reversed_meaning: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty, bias, avoiding responsibility

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.upright_meaning: Suspension, restriction, letting go, sacrifice, martyrdom, new perspective
cards.reversed_meaning: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision, avoiding sacrifice

cards.name: Death
cards.upright_meaning: Endings, beginnings, change, transformation, transition, letting go
cards.reversed_meaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging, stagnation

cards.name: Temperance
cards.upright_meaning: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose, meaning, divine guidance
cards.reversed_meaning: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment, hasty decisions

cards.name: The Devil
cards.upright_meaning: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality, materialism
cards.reversed_meaning: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment, freedom

cards.name: The Tower
cards.upright_meaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening, liberation
cards.reversed_meaning: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster, delayed transformation

cards.name: The Star
cards.upright_meaning: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality, healing, inspiration
cards.reversed_meaning: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection, discouragement

cards.name: The Moon
cards.upright_meaning: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition, dreams, confusion
cards.reversed_meaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion, self-deception

cards.name: The Sun
cards.upright_meaning: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality, joy, confidence, happiness
cards.reversed_meaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic, unrealistic expectations

cards.name: Judgement
cards.upright_meaning: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, forgiveness, awakening, redemption
cards.reversed_meaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call, lack of self-awareness

cards.name: The World
cards.upright_meaning: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel, fulfillment, success
cards.reversed_meaning: Seeking personal closure, short-cut to success, lack of achievement
